Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it! You can see a counter. The counter is vast. On the counter you make out a tomato, a banana, a yellow apple, a cookbook and a knife. You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a stove. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. There is an open plain door leading south. There is an exit to the east. > -= Kitchen =-0/4
